title: Class of ‘24: Emerging Artists Showcase
content: TRAX championed eight of the hottest up-and-coming artists on our platform, culminating in a stellar industry event in London. The event featured live performances by Blanco, Master Peace, and Rosa Cecilia. This showcase highlighted TRAX’s commitment to promoting emerging talent in the music industry.
author: Rodrigo Sharma

title: TRAX x Bobby Shmurda
content: In collaboration with iconic New York rapper Bobby Shmurda, TRAX hosted a sold-out superfan concert in the heart of London. This event marked a significant moment in our efforts to bring global artists closer to their fans, offering an unforgettable live music experience.
author: Rodrigo Sharma

title: TRAX partners with BEAM
content: TRAX became the official digital storefront for GoldLink’s IFFY FM lifestyle and culture brand. Together, we took over the streets of London to showcase our latest collaboration, merging music, lifestyle, and culture in an innovative way.
author: Rodrigo Sharma

title: The Future’s Yesterday: Kenny Allstar x TRAX
content: TRAX supported the roll-out of the UK’s number one urban DJ, Kenny Allstar’s latest mixtape. We organized a sold-out listening party, premiering the mixtape to Kenny’s closest fans. This was the first of many collaborations with leading figures in the urban music scene.
author: Rodrigo Sharma

title: Trademark Secured
content: TRAX received confirmation of our copyright ownership. This milestone is a crucial step in protecting and developing our brand as we continue to expand our influence in the music industry.
author: Rodrigo Sharma

title: Fresh New Look for TRAX
content: In partnership with Slaps Creative (with previous work for Nike, Oakley, Netflix), TRAX finalized a sleek new brand identity that reflects our commitment to being future-facing. This rebranding positions TRAX as a leader in decentralized music on the ICP platform.
author: Rodrigo Sharma
